title: where can i find a map of all upcoming wilmington annexation plans and areas?
text:
I believe this link to a StarNewsOnline.com story will provide some
information for you:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100810/ARTICLES/100819961/1155?p=1&tc=pg



And this link to the city of Wilmington's annexation page has much
more detail:
http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/city_manager/special_projects/annexation_policy.aspx
